comments.body: Nomoex Makes Cryptocurrency Easy to Use in Everyday LifeNomoex is being developed as a blockchain-based finance platform that intends to make crypto accessible and easy to use for everyone in their daily lives. To achieve this, the platform will be offering a range of financial services based on the cutting-edge blockchain technology. These include seamless payments, simplified investments, and smart trading.The Nomoex platform will be made available in two versions:✅Smart Version (for daily life users)✅Pro Version (for Professionals)The Three Components of the Nomoex EcosystemNomoex aims to make cryptocurrency easy to use in everyday life for people with different backgrounds. It will develop state-of-the-art blockchain products across three core financial services/industries, which are payments, investments, and trading.Seamless PaymentsOne of the core objectives of the Nomoex ecosystem is to make payments seamless and secure for everyone in the world. It intends to revolutionize the way people make payments in everyday life by facilitating ‘digital QR code payments via cryptocurrency’.In simple words, Nomoex will allow people to make payments using cryptocurrency by simply scanning merchant QR codes through an app on their phones. This will reduce the hassle of carrying cash for shopping and eliminate the need to exchange currency when traveling abroad.Products: Nomopay, Nomoex Crypto CardsNomopay is a mobile wallet app that lets you scan any merchant QR code and pay with cryptocurrency. The wallet automatically converts cryptocurrency into the local (fiat) currency of your destination when making payments. Alternatively, you can use Nomoex Crypto Cards to make payments using a convenient debit card linked to your crypto wallet.Simplified InvestmentThe mission of the Nomoex project is to make crypto investments simple and accessible to everyone, irrespective of their financial knowledge and background. In other words, Nomoex aims to enable everyone, including novice users, to invest independently and confidently and grow their wealth effortlessly by providing access to advanced investment tools that are extremely simple to use.Smart TradingFor professional traders, Nomoex aims to build a next-gen, AI-driven Smart Trading platform with built-in Pro Trading features and tools, such as Crypto Bots, AI Trading, Pre-Set Droids, and Trailing Orders, which will help boost profits.Products: Spot Trading, Margin Trading, Futures Trading, Copy Trading, and NomoDEXFind out more about the mission of Nomoex in the project whitepaper at https://whitepaper.nomoex.com.
